caption: Network
description: Network event is a generic event that defines a set of attributes available in the Network category.
name: network

dst_endpoint.description: The responder (server) in a network connection.

observation_point.description: Indicates whether the source network endpoint, destination network endpoint, or neither served as the observation point for the activity. The value is normalized to the caption of the observation_point_id.

observation_point_id.description: The normalized identifier of the observation point.

1.caption: Source
1.description: The source network endpoint is the observation point.

2.caption: Destination
2.description: The destination network endpoint is the observation point.

3.caption: Neither
3.description: Neither the source nor destination network endpoint is the observation point.

99.caption: Other
99.description: The observation point is not mapped. See the observation_point attribute for a data source specific value.

src_endpoint.description: The initiator (client) of the network connection.
